Reviews.Title: I needed a non-extending lens camera
Reviews.Author: A. Tay "Private Tay"
Reviews.Content: I didn't get this because it's waterproofI got it because:a. the lens does not protrude - trouble with protruding lenses is, sometimes, when I leave the camera in a bag, it comes on by accident and the lens gets damagedb. it has spot-meterc, there's a physical flash control button - beats the heck out of scrolling through menusWHAT's not so hot is the writing speedAfter recording a video, it may take a while to processMany have complained they find the zoom sluggishI don't have a problemI know what they meanBut the numbers by the side telling me how many times zoom gives me a good ideaWould be great if:a. it were 24mm (and not 28)b. there was more zooming power - but for now, 5x is as much as these survival cams goI like that it's small - like my old Optio W10Still works but no dedicated videoIt's also small and the absence of protrusions makes it handy
